subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: For once, it is tempting to take Shamil Tarpishchev at his word when he claims that his Russian Davis Cup team has only a “35 percent chance” of winning this weekend against the United States.
snippet: For once, it is tempting to take Shamil Tarpishchev at his word when he claims that his Russian Davis Cup team has only a “35 percent chance” of winning this weekend against the United States.
